alert.note: Alert for Baltimore; Cecil; Harford (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 8:10PM EDT until March 31 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sterling Virginia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Harford County in northern Maryland... Northwestern Cecil County in northeastern Maryland... North central Baltimore County in northern Maryland... * Until 900 PM EDT. * At 810 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Stewartstown to 7 miles southeast of Shrewsbury to 8 miles north of Cockeysville, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damaging winds will cause some trees and large branches to fall. This could injure those outdoors, as well as damage homes and vehicles. Roadways may become blocked by downed trees. Localized power outages are possible. Unsecured light objects may become projectiles. * Locations impacted include... Jarrettsville, Rising Sun, Richardsmere, West Nottingham, Octoraro, Conowingo, Rock Springs, Woodlawn, Pylesville, Darlington, Cardiff, Norrisville, Scarboro, Forest Hill, Chrome Hill, Street, Rocks, Whiteford and Hereford. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
